addDroplets(firewallId, dropletIds, callbackopt)

Add droplets to a firewall.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
firewallId string The id of the firewall to update
dropletIds number | Array.<number> The ids of droplets to add. See the official docs for valid attributes.
callback requestCallback <optional>
 callback that handles the response
